title: Print, "Cut-out Construction: Ménagerie", late 19th century
inscribed: Lower right: La MÉNAGERIE No. 34/ Constructions pour enfants/ Avant de ne rien coller il faut attacher des Ms aux cages/ & à la volière à tous ces points.  afin d'imiter des barreaux...?; in right margin: Imp. Lith. CH. Pinot édit à  Epinal. Déposé; On margin with Elephant, Jaguar, Lion and Lionness car:Nouvelle imagerie d'Epinal; construction notations inscribed throughout lithograph.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Peter Cooper Hewitt

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Cut-out Construction: Ménagerie", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Hand-colored lithograph. Museum purchase through gift of Peter Cooper Hewitt. 1953-66-2.
